wip: The app is still work in progress, problems can occour.

content.generator: Generate the text of your poll! Just insert the choices and share it with your fellows.
content.calc: Execute the tally of the poll. Just paste below all your fellows text answers.

card.title: EmojiPoll text generated!
card.content: You can now copy it and/or share it with anyone. Then, you can parse the answers pasting them in the specific page.

text.content: Please answer to this message with the emoji that matches your choice:

calc.helper: Please check below that all the poll's emoji had been parsed correctly and separated by a comma. Correct them if necessary.
